name: Time Step Remastered: DEMO Version
description:
This game was made for The Fresh Game Jam 2021.1, unfortunately we suffered lots of setbacks and had to restart a few times, it's amazing this demo got completed for the jam.

CONTROLS

A/D/LEFTARROW/RIGHTARROW - Move Left/Right

W/Space/UPARROW - Jump

Q - Switch TIme
